data.text: @Oidad3 @nzherald Yeah firing someone from their job is really going to keep them out of hospital
@Ianrobtutu @nzherald Why do you all miss the point - they are about preventing the overwhelming of the hospitals until we're over the peak!    #WakeUp  Get out of the #disinformation bubble

@abakiss81 @heywood_nic @LoonyLefty3 @nzherald There main concern (mandates? Apparently. Though you wouldn't know that by the crackpot signs and streams emanating from there) was heard. There has been a national discussion on the mandates and the govt have stated they arent here forever. Obviously.

@heywood_nic @LoonyLefty3 @nzherald Going to the supermarket getting abused for not wearing a mask is the same thing. There's always going to be people that do that shit but to discredit the protests in general for the sake of a few bad apples is desperate. There's genuine concerns that should be heard.

@forrest_barb @nzherald Ardern, fighting her own people !! HaHaHa !! What a lot crock !! These are not our people 🤷🏽‍♂️ if they were, they would get vaccinated and wear a mask because they care about me and my whanau !! Yeah, Nah !! If you care about me, then I don’t care about you, is my stand !!
@Orcs2Elves @nzherald She's not in control of the police operations. This is basic stuff, FFS.

@abakiss81 @LoonyLefty3 @nzherald Crap, niece abused by a couple of protesters on her way to school for wearing a mask !! Verbal abuse towards children going about their business is not peaceful !! It’s just plain bullying !! 👎🏾
@nzherald ‘like a scene from war’ haha! No, it’s just a bunch of morons being morons.
